titleStmt.title: William Godwin's Diary
titleStmt.author: William Godwin
titleStmt.funder: Leverhulme Foundation and the John Fell OUP Research Fund

publicationStmt.authority: Published by the Godwin Diary Project, University of Oxford

revisionDesc.change: Dr James Cummings generated this file.

div.ab: Jan. 1. Su. Henry VI, Part II: B Thoughtless, Vol. II.
2. M. Monuments; 1 page. B Thoughtless, V. III, p. 100. Oldfields & Hilton call.

3. Tu. B T, p. 288; Vol. IV, p. 207. Call on
Morgan, stationer ; adv. Flint
.
4. W. B T, p. 312. fin.

5. Th. Religio Medici, p. 72: motto.
Theatre, Man & Wife, w. M J & E C; adv. Wilkie & Jas Flather
.

6. F. Call on R Taylor
,
Wilkie
&
E Reynolds
: Hopwood sups; adv. Hilton
.

7. Sa. Monuments, 1 page. Call on De Vint
: Knowles & miss Bonnycastle dine.

Jan. 8. Su. Monuments, 1 page. Call on GMC , w. MJ : sup at Topping's , dto
.
9. M. Hall, Spenser & Davis, Ã§ala. Hilton calls: sup at Lamb's , w. MJ.
10. Tu. Henry VI, Part III, acts 1 & 2. Chamber- laine & Hilton call: NG sups.

11. W. Henry VI, act 3. Call on Clark ( Chamber- lain ) adv. Walker
, & on
J Taylor
: meet mrs Beresford
& Perry . adv. Proby
12. Th. Write to Liebe & TT . Henry VI, acts 4, 5.
13. F. Trimmer's England. Mylius & White call.
14. Sa. Trimmer. Bonnycastle dines.
Jan. 15. Su. Review Trimmer, 5 pp. Write to TT .

16. M.
Jo G calls: sup at Lamb's .
Battle of Corunna .

17. Tu. Mariner. Call on Macmillan
: Bailey, athÃ©e calls.

18. W. Wordsworth, Ã§ala. Theatre, Macbeth, w. MJ
: sup do ., at mrs Beresford's
.

19. Thu. Call on J Robinson :
M calls. Enquirer, Ã§a- la. Parliament meets.

20. F.
Dawe calls: dine at Johnson's , w. Fuse-lis, Bonnycastle & fille; Knowles & Hough-ton.

21. Sa.
Mulready calls: call on LDibbin
&
Mc- millan .

p.add: M. Frizac Hotel de Grande Bretagne prÃ¨s lâHotel le Brun Rue St HonorÃ© Paris His sweet sister Temperance. Camd. Eliz. per Hearne. Apparat. Vol. I, p. 14. Life of sir Thos. Pope. p. 111.

add.persName: Matthew L. Davis Merchant New York
David M. Randolph 6 Francis Street, Golden Square

div.ab: Jan. 22. Su. Religio Medici: Hooker, Ã§ala.
23. M. Hooker, Ã§ala: Massaniello, &c. Wolcot, White, Mulready, E Topping, E Smith dine; stay all night, except White .
24. Tu. Grave: Newspapers. Meet Phillips .

25. W. Call on Miller (Albemarle Street)
,
Macmillan
, &
mrs Beresford
n : Lamb & mrs Oldfield call.
26. Th. Write to W Smith & Sharp . W Stewart & N G call.

27. F. Clinker, p. 22. Hopwood sups.
Wardleâs motion
28. Sa. Write to Miller : Chamberlaine & Mulready n call: theatre, 1/5 Overreach, & 1/2 Perouse: M sups.

Jan. 29. Su. Barret on Swift, Ã§ala.
E Colnet dines & sleeps .
30. M. Clinker, p. 50. Mulready & Jo G call.

31. Tu. Accounts. Miss C Smith , mrs Topping & N G call. Write to Griffiths, on Trimmer
.
Feb. 1. W. Write to P H G . Theatre, Cato; adv. Hill, &c .

2. Th.
Mulready sups. Cato & Seneca, Ã§ala.
3. F. Sepulchres, 1 page. Accounts. Meet H Robinson .
4. Sa. Accounts. Clinker, p. 93. Meet Tuthil .

Feb. 5. Su. Accounts. Call on Lamb
: Hilton & Flather sup.

6. M. Accounts. Lamb & Mulready call:
theatre, Cato; w. M J & 4
.
7. Tu. Accounts. Theatre, Gamester, & Is he a Prince.
8. W. Accounts. Write to Raine . Sup at mrs Toppingâs , w. M J .
9. Th. Accounts. Dawe at tea. Theatre, Unconsious Counterfeit.

10. F. Accounts. Houghton , Jo G & J Hazlit call: dine at
Johnsonâs , w. Fuseli, Aikin, Bonnycastle, Cartwright & Knowles .
11. Sa. Accounts. Write to Grattan . Mulready sups. Sepulchres published .
Feb. 12. Su. Accounts. Write to Johnson . Life of Hume, Ritchie, Ã§ala. Dibbin calls.

13. M. Call on Phillips
&
Johnson
: British Gallery; adv. Hayward, Dawe & Christal
: meet J Taylor : Raddon & N G call.

14. Tu. Call on R Taylor
,
H Rogers
,
Phillips
, & (for M J ) mrs Beresford
. Call on Lamb
: M Lamb calls.

15. W. Clinker, p. 147. Call on Phillips
n .
16. Th. Write to E Fk . Smollet, 1745, pp. 36. Meet Agar : Surr calls: theatre, Monody to Moore.
17. F. Hebrides, Johnson, p. 150: Clinker, p. 174. R Curran & Surr n call.

18. Sa. Clinker, p. 198, fin. Call on Ralph
: Phillips & Surr call.

Feb. 19. Su. Literary History, notes. Jo G calls: sup at
Phillipsâs , w. Surrs; adv. Carr
.

20. M. Lit. History, notes. Call on Cobb
: N G calls.
21. Tu. Lit. History, notes. Sup at Lambâs , w. M J .
22. W. Lit. History, arrange. M Lamb & M call.

23. Th. Read Godwinâs England, p. 34. Lamb calls:
theatre, w. M J; Circassian Bride .

24. F. England, p. 65. Call on W Miller
&
Grattan
n : meet Morris & Perry : White calls: Fairly & G M C at tea.
Drury Lane Theatre burned.
25. Sa. L History, 1/2 page. Dine at S Beresfordâs , w. M J, Macarthy, Johnsons, mrs Atkins & miss H Woodcock .
Feb. 26. Su. L History, p. 2/2. Chaucer, Ã§ala. Drury Lane, w. M J .
27. M. Write to Booth & P H G . Fairly calls: exhition, Ten CÃ¦sars.

28. Tu. Call on Goodbehere
,
Pearsal
&
R Taylor
: M dines: theatre, Henry 8. Seabrook calls n .
Mar. 1. W. Itinerant Orator, &c, ms.
2. Th. Life of Robertson, pp. 307. Seabrook & Pearsal call: Fairly dines.

3. F. Robertson, Ã§ala. Fairly & mrs Shepperd call: dine at
Johnsonâs , w. Bonnycastle & Dr Knighton .
4. Sa. Laingâs Mary, p. 152: Homeâs Rebellion, p. 124.
Mar. 5. Su. Homeâs Rebellion, p. 261: Laing, 151. Lambs sup.
6. M. Home, p. 394, fin: Laing, p. 211. M calls: Hopwood sups.
7. Tu. Laing, p. 371, fin.
9. Th. Pitscottie, p. 116. G M C at tea: theatre, Independence; adv. Phillipses, Surr (Walpoles & Pole) .
10. F. Pitscottie, p. 127. Dine at Johnsonâs , w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle, Lockhart, Hollis, & Dr Stokes & Knowles : Hopwood sups. Nicholsons call n .
11. Sa. Rome, p. 3. Beresfords call. Mrs Cowley dies.
Mar. 12. Su. Write to M, Hollis & Johnson . Pitscottie, p. 199.
13. M. Write to Miller, Perth . Pitscottie, p. 230. Revolution in Sweden
14. Tu. Jus Regni, p. 10: Pitscottie, p. 326, fin. Crosby calls.
15. W. Jus Regni, p. 16. Walsh , M , Ash na & Dawe call: Wolcot & Hazlit dine.

16. Th. Jus Regni, p. 22: Buchanan, L. VIII, p. 250-261. Call on J White
: Hazlit calls.

17. F. Jus Regni, p. 30: Hist., p. 267. Call on Phillips
: Hazlit & Jo G call.

18. Sa. Write to P H G . Jus Regni, p. 38: Hist., p. 271. F, 7 s .
Duke of York resigns

Mar. 19. Su. Buchanan, p. 275. Grattan & E Mercier call: call on Ht ; adv. Tuthil
.

20. M. Buchanan, Lib. VII, p. 207-216. Call on
Phillips
,
Crosby
,
Ht
(adv. Harwood, Thelwal & Dawe) na &
Smirke
: N G calls.

21. Tu. Buchanan, p. 224. Call on Ht ; adv. Harwoods
: Hazlit & H Robinson n call: sup at Toppingâs , w. M J & miss Zielske .

22. W. Buchanan, p. 230. Hazlit calls: M & mrs Topping dine: call on Ht
na .

23. Th. Buchanan, p. 240. Jo G , Boardman , Hazlit , H Robinson & Dawe call: call on
L Ht ; adv. Harwoods, mrs Nicholson & Lambs
. Letter for Jo . Ht dies
24. F. Buchanan, p. 248. Ralph calls: tea L Htâs , w. M J . Sepulchres, passim.

25. Sa. Buchanan, p. 275-280. Call on Johnson
.
A Seward dies

Mar. 26. Su.
Grattan calls breakfasts : call on
L Ht ; adv. mrs Nicholson, M Lamb & Tuthil
: H Robinson au soir.

27. M. Buchanan, p. 287: Femmes Savantes, 2 actes. Call on Crosby
&
R Taylor
: tea Nicholsonâs ; adv. Harwood
: Clipstone Street, for M J ; adv. M Dawe
.

28. Tu. Call on Phillips ; adv. James & Morgan
:
F Walsh dines & sleeps : tea Nicholsonâs , w. Harwood; adv. Tuthil
: Lambs & R Lloyd sup.

29. W.
W Darton , M , Masters , mrs Topping & miss Ford call: call on
Lambs
,
Knowles
&
Murray
: tea Nicholsonâs w. Harwood & Tuthil : Clipstone Str, for M J ; adv. M Dawe
.

30. Th. Rome, p. 4, 5. Letter to Harris . Jus Regni, p. 42.
Turner jr, Devon. Strt
, calls: tea Wardâs , w. Knotts & R Lloyd .

31. F. Dine at Humeâs , w. Draper, mrs Thomson, Johnsons, Ford & mrs Hutchinson; adv. Mortons & 3 pupils
. Burr calls.

Apr. 1. Sa. Funeral of Ht, w. Shield, Nicholson, Harwood, Buchan, Lamb, Thelwal, Dawe & Ralph :
Sh. Turnerâs, w. Harwood, Thelwal & Â£83 . R Cloud sups; adv. C Mercier
.

Apr. 2. Su. Call on Hardy
: tea Nicholsonâs , w. Harwood & Tuthil; adv. L & F Ht
.

3. M. Wolsey, pp. 8. Nicholson calls: call on Nicholson , w. M J : sup at L Htâs , w. M J; adv. E Mr
.

4. Tu. Rome, p. 7. Wilkie calls: tea
Nicholsonâs
: call on Macmillan
: sup at Hollisâs
.

5. W.
Crown & Anchor; present W N, G T, Thelwal, H Robinson, Lamb, Stodart, Collier, Le Maitre, Hardy, Ralph, Spyring & Dawe : dine at Thelwalâs
: Hopwood sups.

6. Th. Ht. pp. 2. Call on Waithman
,
Russel
,
Johnson
: G M C tea; adv. Burr & H Robinson
: tea Nicholsonâs
. Hardy calls: call on Perry
.

7. F. Warburtonâs Letters, Ã§ala. Dyer , &
Burr (twice) call : dine at Johnsonâs , w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle, Hollis, capt. Hunter & Eaton .

8. Sa. Call on Phillips
&
Ralph
: M dines; adv. R T
.

Apr. 9. Su. Buchanan, p. 293. Mrs Ht & V Ht breakfast; adv. Dawe
: Hoare calls.

10. M. Ht, pp. 2. Call on
Raine
: Nicholson & M call.

11. Tu. Call on Chater
&
Longman ; adv. Hurst
: call on Lambs ; adv. L Ht
: Nicholson calls.

12. W. Ht, p. 5, fin. Call on Chase
: theatre (Lyceum), Rivals, acts 2 & 3.

13. Th.
Ralph n , Chase , Shield n , Lloyd n , Dawe n , M n & Burr n call: meet Nicholson, at L Htâs
: dine at Thelwalâs , w. Nicholson, Wolcot, Mortimer, Soane, Brittons & miss Pate .

14. F. Call on Robinson
(adv. Morgan) ,
Ward
,
Phillips
&
Stewart
.

15. Sa. Call on Johnson
&
Kensington
:
theatre, w. M J, 4/5 Henry 8 .
Apr. 16. Su. Rome, p. 15. Hoare calls: call on Nicholson , w. M J : Burr sups.
17. M. Rome, p. 18/2. M calls.

18. Tu. Rome, p. 22/2. Call on Smirke
: Burr au soir.
19. W. Rome, p. 26/2. M & Ralph call: Topping & Smith sup.

20. Th. Rome, p. 28. Tea
Nicholsonâs
n; adv. L Ht
. Battle of Abensberg

21. F. Rome, p. 31.
Theatre, w. M J, Grievingâs a Folly; adv. Hume
: call on Nicholson
, &
Cooke
n : Mercier calls n .
22. Sa. Rome, p. 34. Davis, attorney, calls. Battle of Eckmuhl

Apr. 23. Su. Rome, p. 38. Call on Shield
n : Lbs
L Ht breakfasts: Lambs at tea; Burr aprÃ¨s
.

24. M. Rome, p. 41/2. Call on Lambs
& Wr Hall : M dines: Evans calls & Hossick : Listons sup; adv. Burr
: mrs & R Taylor call n : meet Busby & Hopwood .

25. Tu. Rome, p. 47/2. Chamberlaine & Graves call: call on Smirke
n : Burr, ppc.

26. W. Rome, p. 49. Call on Randolph
&
Smirke
na {.} Write to Curran .

27. Th. Rome, p. 52/2. Call on Ralph
: M calls: F & V Ht dine: Randolph calls.

28. F. Rome, p. 53/2. Call on Place
&
Curtis
: dine at Johnsonâs , w. Bonnycastle, Knowles, Beaufort & H Edgworth .

29. Sa. Rome, p. 54. Write to M L Davis & W Smith : call on Smirke
n &
Nicholson
: Bonnycastle & Clennel call.
Apr. 30. Su. Rome, p. 58/2. Rollin, &c, Ã§ala.

May 1. M. Carthage, Ã§ala. Lofft breakfasts; adv. L Ht
: Exhibition; Wilkie, Haughton, Heywood, J Foote, J Taylor, G Dawe, Lamb, Jno. Flr (& T T) : theatre, 1/2 Grieving, & Temper.

2. Tu. Write to S Lofft . M , Hollis , & mrs J Taylor : Lofft & mrs Taylor dine; adv. R T & miss Burrel
: call on Nicholson ; adv. L Ht
: Lofft sups.

3. W. Carthage, Ã§ala. L Ht breakfasts:
Lofft dines & sups.

4. Th.
M breakfasts: Smirke & L Ht call: call on
Nicholson
:
Lofft tea & sups. Od, 75.

5. F. Rome, p. 60. Chamberlaine & Jo G call:
theatre, w. M J & F, Venice Preserved : Lofft sups.

6. Sa. Rome, p. 63. Brooke & Davis call: call on
Davis
,
Lamb
,
Randolph
n &
Smirke
n : M
Lofft tea & sups; adv. Mercier & W C Brown
.
May 7. Su. Rome, p. 64. Poetry for Children, Ã§ala.
8. M. Rome, p. 67. Mercier , Macmillan , Dawe , Lofft na , Brooke & Clennel call: M dines.

9. Tu. Rome, p. 70/2. Od, 155. Prattent , R Taylor & Randolph n call: call on Nicholson
: Flather sups.
10. W. Rome, p. 72/2. Prattent , Cruickshank , Russel , Brooke , M Jones na call. Od, 230. Write to T W Coke . L & F Ht call: M dines.

11. Th. Rome, p. 76/2. Od, 319. Russel & N G call: call on
Thelwal
: M Lamb calls.

12. F. Od, 399. Lamb , Raddon , L Ht , Nicholson & G M C call: dine at
Johnsonâs , w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle, Knowles, 2 Roscoes & Dr Tuston : Lbs sup; adv. Brooke
: V Ht to Xtâs .

13. Sa. Rome, p. 76. M Lamb & Randolph call (Hammersley).
Vienna taken

May 14. Su. Rome, p. 80. Od, 444.
Porteus dies.

15. M. Rome, p. 81. Scipio, Ã§ala. Call on Nicholson
. Write to Fairly & E Fk . Mrs Taylor calls na .
16. Tu. Rome, p. 86/2. Mrs Taylor & Lamb call.

17. W. Rome, p. 88. Prattent calls:
theatre, w. M J. Mountaineers, & Blue Devils; adv. Graves & Wilkie
. Brooke calls n .

18. Th. Rome, p. 93/2. Mercier , Pass , Raddon & Wilcocke n call: Lamb at tea: L Ht calls: call on
Brooke
n .

19. F. Rome, p. 97.
Brooke & Jo G call: call on
Toppings
: M J at Htâs .

20. Sa. Rome, p. 101. Brooke calls: call on Nicholson
.

May 21. Su. Rome, p. 102. Sallust, Jug., c. 62. Call on Perry
n .

22. M. Rome, p. 106/2. Call on Hume
&
Macmillan
: Blake, map-engr , calls
Battle of Esling

23. Tu. Rome, p. 107/2. Call on Mercier
: Mcmillan & Randolph call.

24. W. Rome, p. 108. Call on Pass
&
Nicholson
: Mrs & miss Harwood at tea.

25. Th. Rome, p. 109. Spilsbury calls: call on Mrs Nicholson
.
26. F. Rome, p. 111. Hazlit , Jo G & Russel call: meet H Robinson .
27. Sa. Rome, p. 114.

May 28. Su. Rome, p. 120.
L Ht & E Mercier at tea & sup; adv. Hazlit
.

29. M. Rome, p. 123. Sup at
Lambâs , w. M J, M Burney & Hazlit : call on mrs Norris , w. M J . Lucan, B. IX.
30. Tu. Rome, p. 130, fin.

31. W. Rome, 1 page. revise. Call on Phillips
: M calls: Flather sups.
June 1. Th. Rome, 1 page: preface. Call on Jo & N G : write to Bradenham : Hazlit calls.
2. F. Grecian History, Rollin, Ã§ala. Hazlit & Jo G call.

3. Sa. Mitford, Ã§ala. R Taylor & Lamb & Jo G call: call on Spllsbury
.

June 4. Su. Mitford, Ã§ala.
Jo & N G call: dine at Listonâs , w. Humes, Laburns, Ogleby & M J .

5. M. Greece, p. 3/2. H Robinson calls: invitÃ©s Ã diner, 5 Humes & S Michelson : call on Pearsal
.

6. Tu. Greece, p. 6/2. Call on Grosvenor
: Jo G & Raddon call: meet Goodbehere : Lamb & Hazlit sup.

7. W. Greece, p. 9. Meet Col. White : L Ht n & M call: Hazlit dines: tea
Perryâs , w. Hazlit, Lunan & mrs Bentley; adv. Lambert & Lind
.
8. Th. Greece, p. 11. Col. White & Jo G call: meet H Robinson . Write to T T : calls.

9. F. Call on Miller
: dine at Johnsonâs , w. Bonnycastle, Constable, & Miller, Edinburgh
.

10. Sa. Greece, p. 13. Thompson calls: call on Pass
.
June 11. Su. Preface to Dictionary, pp. 5. L Ht & E Mercier dine: Jo G calls.

12. M. Greece, p. 15/2. Wilcocke calls: call on
Constable
,
Park
&
Russel engr
: Raddon calls, & R Tr
.

13. Tu. Call on Cotton (Limehouse, & L Hl ) &
Pearsal
: Thompson , Hopwood , & Harris of Aylesbury call: Flather sups. Adams calls n .
14. W. Dictionary, proof. Constable , Miller & Blackwood , & Jo G call: call on Wolcot n & Carlisle : meet Pratt : 2 Hopwoods sup.

15. Th. Call on Turner, Limehouse ; adv. Cotton & W G
: meet White : Thompson calls.

16. F. Write to W G . Jo G calls: call on
Theobald, Bill-brokers
,
Thompson
&
Carlisle
: Hazlit sups.

17. Sa. Preface to Rome, pp. 1 1/2. Call on R Taylor
: theatre, Stratagem, acts 1, 2, 3. Carlisle calls n .

June 18. Su. Mitford, &c. E, H & M Hopwood at tea; adv. Hazlit
: E Colnet calls.

19. M. Call, w. M J, on Pass
: Brooke sups.

20. Tu. Call on Theobald
: R Taylor & Aspin call, & Jo G .
21. W. Greece, p. 16. L Ht & M call, & R Taylor & Spilsbury . Burning Pestle, acts 1 & 2.

22. Th. Greece, p. 20/2. (Salts.)
Macmillan calls. Burning Pestle, fin: Noble Gentleman, act 1.
23. F. Noble Gentleman, acts 3, 2, 4. M J & M for Notting Hill . M dines.
24. Sa. Greece, p. 25. Jo G & Lamb call. Write to T T : calls : write in reply.
June 25. Su. Dine at Notting Hill, w. 2 Corneys, M J, M & C .
26. M. Call on Pass , w. W : theatre, Up all Night. Write to Mylius .
27. Tu. Write to T T & Arnold . Greece, 1 page. Meet Buchan .

28. W. Write to M J . (Salts.) Call on R Taylor
: M J & M at home. Fool of Quality, p. 38.
29. Th. Fool of Quality, p. 80. Letter from T T . Girle calls.

30. Sa F.
Bailey & M call: call on Pass
: dine at Johnsonâs , w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle, Halls, Jas Moore, Laing, br, & son .

July 1. Sa.
Theatre, 2/5 Honey-Moon, & Killing No Murder. Varvicensis, Ã§ala: Chervet calls.
July 2. Su. Greece, p. 27. Jo & N G call.
3. M. Greece, p. 34/2. Fool of Quality, p. 126.

4. Tu. Greece, p. 35. Wordsworth, p. 25. Call on Lamb ; adv. Norris
: Flather sups. 3 Colnets dine.

5. W. Dictionary, proof. Call on Phillips
. Wordsworth, p. 58.

6. Th.
Chamberlaine & W Stewart call: Humes, 4, dine; adv. Girle
: Ely Chapel, Legh Richmond, w. Hume . Battle of Wagram
7. F. Write to Constable . Wordsworth, p. 108. H Robinson , R Taylor & Girle call.
8. Sa. Greece, p. 40. InvitÃ©s Ã diner, Bonnycastle, Knowles & H Robinson : Lamb & Mcmillan call.
July 9. Su. Greece, Ã§ala. Wordsworth, p. 191, fin.
10. M. Greece, p. 43/2. M , Chamberlaine & R Taylor call: theatre, Foundling of ye Forest, acts 2, 3. Pass calls.

11. Tu. Greece, p. 44/2. L Ht dines; adv. G M C & miss Baldwin
.

12. W. Write to Constable , Spence, Moseley , Shepherd , Upham , Booth & Deck . Parke , Berry & Girle n call: call on Nicholson ; adv. L Ht
. H Robinson calls, & Hopwood n . Armistice of Znaim
13. Th. Greece, p. 47/2. Write to Knott & Lloyd . Rome published
14. F. Greece, p. 50/2. Col. White calls: 4 Hopwoods & Girle sup.
15. Sa. Greece, p. 53/2. Bonnycastle, Knowles, H Robinson & Randolph dine.

July 16. Su. Dine at L Htâs , w. M J, M & J; adv. B Montagu
. Fool of Quality, p. 176.

17. M. Fool of Qy, Vol. II, p. 58. Joyce , Col. White & M Lamb na calls: call on Lamb
n . Write to Shepd, Liverpool
.
Dictionary published

18. Tu. Write for Col. White . White & Berry call: call on Pearsal
&
Ralph
. Theatre, Foundling, act 1.
19. W. Write to col. Barry . F. of Q, p. 118. L Ht calls.

20. Th. Dictionary, Ã§ala. Call on Hume
,
Knowles
&
Lamb ; adv. L M n
: M dines: call, w. him, on Lancaster
.

21. F. Dictionary, Ã§ala. F of Q, p. 160. M Jones calls: call on Moore, Basing Lane
: dine at Johnsonâs , w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle, Dennis, Dr Edgworth, capt. Hunter & Knowles .
22. Sa. Dictionary, Ã§ala. Theatre, Russian Impostor: Girle sups.
July 23. Su. Dictionary, Ã§ala. F of Q, p. 58, Vol. III.

24. M. Call on Parke,
Curtis
&
Sturch
: S E calls. Call on
Wordsworth
: meet Foulkes & Longdil . F of Q, p. 109.

25. Tu. F of Q, p. 158. Call on Ward
, & (w. C. C) on Lancaster
: M Jones calls: S E dines. meet Tuthill .

26. W. F of Q, Vol. IV, p. 46. Call on Evans (Mullet);
Parke
&
Phillips
(adv. Mortimer) : dine at Humeâs , w. Macdonalds, Colliers, Ford, Girle & mrs Thomson .
27. Th. Dictionary, Ã§ala. Write to Wilson (York) & M Jones . Berry calls, & Bonnycastle . meet Foulkes & Longdil.
28. F. Dictionary, Ã§ala. Write to Fairly . Hollis & Randolph call: 2 Hopwoods & Flather sup.

29. Sa. New Guide, p. 2: Dictionary, Ã§ala. Berry & Flather call:meet Plunket .
I think I have made an entirely new discovery as to the way of teaching ye Eng. lange
.

July 30. Su. Dine at Bonnycastleâs , w. Knowles, M J & C; adv. miss Boyce & Fred
. Winsor.
31. M. Dictionary, Ã§ala. F of Q, p. 98. F Ht at tea.

Aug. 1. Tu. Write to Mozley, Meyler , M Jones , Nicholson , Booth (Norwich) & Deck . Dictionary, Ã§ala.
Theatre, 1/2 Soldierâs Dr & Vintagers; adv. J Taylor
.

2. W. Dictionary, Ã§ala. Write to Upham . Mrs Sermo calls, N G & J Taylor n
.
3. Th. Dictionary, Ã§ala. Write to Shepherd (Liverpool) & S Pilcher .

4. F. Dictionary, Ã§ala. Write to Shephard (Bristol) . Call on H Robinson n ; adv. mrs Collier
.
5. Sa. Dictionary, Ã§ala. H Robinson calls: Girle sups. F. of Q, p. 159, fin.
Aug. 6. Su. Dictionary, Ã§ala.

7. M. Dictionary, Ã§ala. Hear of M Smart . Call on Mylius
; &, w. M J, on Darnel
&
Hopwoods
: meet G M C & F Ht .

8. Tu. Dictionary, Ã§ala. Mrs Boinville calls: Lancasterâs Lecture, w. M J; adv. Dawe, Jno Flather, R Taylor & mrs Livie
: Girle sups. G M C calls.

9. W. Dictionary, Ã§ala. Write to Booth & Frizac . Call on Major br
: Dawe & Hopwood sup: meet Ward . F, J & W for Somers Town .

10. Th. Dictionary, Ã§ala. Call on Fanny
; write to her . meet Mylius .
11. F. Dictionary, Ã§ala. Girle breakfasts: L Ht sups. mrs Topping calls.
12. Sa. Dictionary, Ã§ala. M calls: Girle dines.
Aug. 13. Su. Dine at Phillipsâs, Hampstead , w. Surrs . Ann Godwin dies .
14. M. Dictionary, Ã§ala. L Ht & M sup.
15. Tu. Dictionary, Ã§ala. H & N G call, & Flather n : Hopwoods & children at Lancasterâs .
16. W. Dictionary, fin. R Taylor & Orme call: coach; w. Jo, N, Mason & Doctor : tea Hoddesdon: sup Cambridge.

17. Th. Breakfast at Brandon: dress at Swaffham: dine at Bradenham: call on Sykes
: sleep at Dalling. write.
18. F. Funeral; Sykes, Woodcock, Dawson, Woodhouse junr , 4 Ravens, 2 Kettles (Allen, parish-clerk) : sleep at Dalling. write.

19. Sa. Meeting of Woodcock, & 3 brothers : call on mrs Woodhouse
: dine Ravenâs
: tea Dawsonâs
: sleep at Bradenham.
Aug. 20. Su. Ride, w. John Baker : coach, Swaffham ; dine at Brandon: deliq: sleep at Cambridge. write.
21. M. View Colleges, &c, Kingâs College Chapel : deliq. write.
22. Tu. Coach, w. Blanch, Maria & Lucy : lunch, Hoddesdon: dine at S S: F , C , W , Lamb & Hazlit call: deliq. duo.

23. W.
Deliq. duo, &c . M Lamb , N G & Hopwood call.
24. Th. Write to Woodcock & Upham . M & Hazlit call: T T sups. meet Northmore .

25. F.
Baxter of Dundee
& T T call: dine at
Johnsonâs , w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle, Hewlet, Davy, Lockhart & Miles : Lambs sup; adv. L Ht
.

26. Sa. Call on Johnson
&
Crosby
: T T calls: L Ht dines.
Aug. 27. Su. Burns, Ã§ala. Baxter, fille & T T dine{:} walk to Somers Town : N G calls.

28. M. Walk w. T T ; T T at tea; adv. Hopwood
.

29. Tu. Write to S P & Walter Miller . Miss Baxter dines; adv. pÃ¨re
: M & T T call: N G sups.
30. W. Booth, Ã§ala. L Ht & S H Wilcocke na call: T T sups. W

.

T T calls & sups .

6. W. Guide, p. 11/2, & Ã§ala. T T calls: M, H, E, F & P Hopwood dine; adv. W H
: fair, Scowton, w. M, J, C & W
.

,

,

&

Johnson
nit .

, sur la Langue Francique

2. M. Annals, 1787, 1788. Call, w. Curran, on Burroughs
&
Boville: Curran dines: Matthews calls. Write to Shepherd , Peeling

3. Tu. Annals, 1789 to 1791. Call on Law
: T T sups. rev. T Smith calls: L Ht & A Harwood at tea.

4. W. Annals, 1792, 3. Call on Law
& Hunter (Constable): walk, w. T T, to Purserâs Cross : dine w. Newnum
. theatre, adv. Kid, Goldsmith & Bourgeois
.
Perceval, Treasury.

5. Th. Annals, 1794. Call on Johnson twice; conference
.
6. F. Write to M Jones & Barret . Estimates. Dine at Johnsonâs , w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle, Lockht & Dennis : T T sups.

7. Sa. Write to Woodcock . Call on Johnson
: dine at Dennisâs , w. Johnson, Fuseli, Bonnycastle & Lockhart .

: T T , Dawe & Jo G call.

J White
,
Law
&
Johnson
: mrs Hume dines:
N G sups (Â£150) .

. Hutchinson , T T & F Ht call: theatre, Love in a Village.

&
Jo G
.

Woolnoth & Curran call: theatre, Poor Gentleman: Girle sups. Fashe Life, p. 390. Peace of Vienna .

n ,
Place
